chapter.text: Taha
Ma 'Anzalna `Alayka Al-Qur'ana Litashqa
Illa Tadhkiratan Liman Yakhsha
Tanzilaan Mimman Khalaqa Al-'Arđa Wa As-Samawati Al-`Ula
Ar-Rahmanu `Ala Al-`Arshi Astawa
Lahu Ma Fi As-Samawati Wa Ma Fi Al-'Arđi Wa Ma Baynahuma Wa Ma Tahta Ath-Thara
Wa 'In Tajhar Bil-Qawli Fa'innahu Ya`lamu As-Sirra Wa 'Akhfa
Allahu La 'Ilaha 'Illa Huwa Lahu Al-'Asma'u Al-Husna
Wa Hal 'Ataka Hadithu Musa
Idh Ra'a Naraan Faqala Li'hlihi Amkuthu 'Inni 'Anastu Naraan La`alli 'Atikum Minha Biqabasin 'Aw 'Ajidu `Ala An-Nari Hudaan
Falamma 'Ataha Nudi Ya Musa
Inni 'Ana Rabbuka Fakhla` Na`layka 'Innaka Bil-Wadi Al-Muqaddasi Tuaan
Wa 'Ana Akhtartuka Fastami` Lima Yuha
Innani 'Ana Allahu La 'Ilaha 'Illa 'Ana Fa`budni Wa 'Aqimi As-Salaata Lidhikri
Inna As-Sa`ata 'Atiyatun 'Akadu 'Ukhfiha Litujza Kullu Nafsin Bima Tas`a
Fala Yasuddannaka `Anha Man La Yu'uminu Biha Wa Attaba`a Hawahu Fatarda
Wa Ma Tilka Biyaminika Ya Musa
Qala Hiya `Asaya 'Atawakka'u `Alayha Wa 'Ahushu Biha `Ala Ghanami Wa Liya Fiha Ma'aribu 'Ukhra
Qala 'Alqiha Ya Musa
Fa'alqaha Fa'idha Hiya Hayyatun Tas`a
Qala Khudh/ha Wa La Takhaf Sanu`iduha Sirataha Al-'Ula
Wa Ađmum Yadaka 'Ila Janahika Takhruj Bayđa'a Min Ghayri Su'in 'Ayatan 'Ukhra
Linuriyaka Min 'Ayatina Al-Kubra
Adh/hab 'Ila Fir`awna 'Innahu Tagha
Qala Rabbi Ashrah Li Sadri
Wa Yassir Li 'Amri
Wa Ahlul `Uqdatan Min Lisani
Yafqahu Qawli
Wa Aj`al Li Waziraan Min 'Ahli
Haruna 'Akhi
Ashdud Bihi 'Azri
Wa 'Ashrik/hu Fi 'Amri
Kay Nusabbihaka Kathiraan
Wa Nadhkuraka Kathiraan
Innaka Kunta Bina Basiraan
Qala Qad 'Utita Su'ulaka Ya Musa
Wa Laqad Mananna `Alayka Marratan 'Ukhra
Idh 'Awhayna 'Ila 'Ummika Ma Yuha
Ani Aqdhifihi Fi At-Tabuti Faqdhifihi Fi Al-Yammi Falyulqihi Al-Yammu Bis-Sahili Ya'khudh/hu `Aduwun Li Wa`aduwun Lahu Wa 'Alqaytu `Alayka Mahabbatan Minni Wa Litusna`a `Ala `Ayni

Idh Tamshi 'Ukhtuka Fataqulu Hal 'Adullukum `Ala Man Yakfuluhu Faraja`naka 'Ila 'Ummika Kay Taqarra `Aynuha Wa La Tahzana Wa Qatalta Nafsaan Fanajjaynaka Mina Al-Ghammi Wa Fatannaka Futunaan Falabithta Sinina Fi 'Ahli Madyana Thumma Ji'ta `Ala Qadarin Ya Musa
Wa Astana`tuka Linafsi
Adh/hab 'Anta Wa 'Akhuka Bi'ayati Wa La Taniya Fi Dhikri
Adh/haba 'Ila Fir`awna 'Innahu Tagha
Faqula Lahu Qawlaan Layyinaan La`allahu Yatadhakkaru 'Aw Yakhsha
Qala Rabbana 'Innana Nakhafu 'An Yafruta `Alayna 'Aw 'An Yatgha
Qala La Takhafa 'Innani Ma`akuma 'Asma`u Wa 'Ara
Fa'tiyahu Faqula 'Inna Rasula Rabbika Fa'arsil Ma`ana Bani 'Isra'ila Wa La Tu`adhibhum Qad Ji'naka Bi'ayatin Min Rabbika Wa As-Salamu `Ala Mani Attaba`a Al-Huda
Inna Qad 'Uhiya 'Ilayna 'Anna Al-`Adhaba `Ala Man Kadhaba Wa Tawalla
Qala Faman Rabbukuma Ya Musa
Qala Rabbuna Al-Ladhi 'A`ta Kulla Shay'in Khalqahu Thumma Hada
Qala Fama Balu Al-Quruni Al-'Ula
Qala `Ilmuha `Inda Rabbi Fi Kitabin La Yađillu Rabbi Wa La Yansa
Al-Ladhi Ja`ala Lakumu Al-'Arđa Mahdaan Wa Salaka Lakum Fiha Subulaan Wa 'Anzala Mina As-Sama'i Ma'an Fa'akhrajna Bihi 'Azwajaan Min Nabatin Shatta
Kulu Wa Ar`aw 'An`amakum 'Inna Fi Dhalika La'ayatin Li'wli An-Nuha
Minha Khalaqnakum Wa Fiha Nu`idukum Wa Minha Nukhrijukum Taratan 'Ukhra
Wa Laqad 'Araynahu 'Ayatina Kullaha Fakadhaba Wa 'Aba
Qala 'Aji'tana Litukhrijana Min 'Arđina Bisihrika Ya Musa
Falana'tiyannaka Bisihrin Mithlihi Faj`al Baynana Wa Baynaka Maw`idaan La Nukhlifuhu Nahnu Wa La 'Anta Makanaan Suaan
Qala Maw`idukum Yawmu Az-Zinati Wa 'An Yuhshara An-Nasu Đuhaan
Fatawalla Fir`awnu Fajama`a Kaydahu Thumma 'Ata
Qala Lahum Musa Waylakum La Taftaru `Ala Allahi Kadhibaan Fayushitakum Bi`adhabin Wa Qad Khaba Mani Aftara
Fatanaza`u 'Amrahum Baynahum Wa 'Asarru An-Najwa
Qalu 'In Hadhani Lasahirani Yuridani 'An Yukhrijakum Min 'Arđikum Bisihrihima Wa Yadh/haba Bitariqatikumu Al-Muthla
Fa'ajmi`u Kaydakum Thumma A'tu Saffaan Wa Qad 'Aflaha Al-Yawma Mani Asta`la
Qalu Ya Musa 'Imma 'An Tulqiya Wa 'Imma 'An Nakuna 'Awwala Man 'Alqa
Qala Bal 'Alqu Fa'idha Hibaluhum Wa `Isiyuhum Yukhayyalu 'Ilayhi Min Sihrihim 'Annaha Tas`a
Fa'awjasa Fi Nafsihi Khifatan Musa
Qulna La Takhaf 'Innaka 'Anta Al-'A`la
Wa 'Alqi Ma Fi Yaminika Talqaf Ma Sana`u 'Innama Sana`u Kaydu Sahirin Wa La Yuflihu As-Sahiru Haythu 'Ata
Fa'ulqiya As-Saharatu Sujjadaan Qalu 'Amanna Birabbi Haruna Wa Musa

Qala 'Amantum Lahu Qabla 'An 'Adhana Lakum 'Innahu Lakabirukumu Al-Ladhi `Allamakumu As-Sihra Fala'uqatti`anna 'Aydiyakum Wa 'Arjulakum Min Khilafin Wa La'usallibannakum Fi Judhu`i An-Nakhli Wa Lata`lamunna 'Ayyuna 'Ashaddu `Adhabaan Wa 'Abqa
Qalu Lan Nu'uthiraka `Ala Ma Ja'ana Mina Al-Bayyinati Wa Al-Ladhi Fatarana Faqđi Ma 'Anta Qađin 'Innama Taqđi Hadhihi Al-Hayaata Ad-Dunya
Inna 'Amanna Birabbina Liyaghfira Lana Khatayana Wa Ma 'Akrahtana `Alayhi Mina As-Sihri Wa Allahu Khayrun Wa 'Abqa
Innahu Man Ya'ti Rabbahu Mujrimaan Fa'inna Lahu Jahannama La Yamutu Fiha Wa La Yahya
Wa Man Ya'tihi Mu'uminaan Qad `Amila As-Salihati Fa'ula'ika Lahumu Ad-Darajatu Al-`Ula
Jannatu `Adnin Tajri Min Tahtiha Al-'Anharu Khalidina Fiha Wa Dhalika Jaza'u Man Tazakka
Wa Laqad 'Awhayna 'Ila Musa 'An 'Asri Bi`ibadi Fađrib Lahum Tariqaan Fi Al-Bahri Yabasaan La Takhafu Darakaan Wa La Takhsha
Fa'atba`ahum Fir`awnu Bijunudihi Faghashiyahum Mina Al-Yammi Ma Ghashiyahum
Wa 'Ađalla Fir`awnu Qawmahu Wa Ma Hada
Ya Bani 'Isra'ila Qad 'Anjaynakum Min `Aduwikum Wa Wa`adnakum Janiba At-Turi Al-'Aymana Wa Nazzalna `Alaykumu Al-Manna Wa As-Salwa
Kulu Min Tayyibati Ma Razaqnakum Wa La Tatghaw Fihi Fayahilla `Alaykum Ghađabi Wa Man Yahlil `Alayhi Ghađabi Faqad Hawa
Wa 'Inni Laghaffarun Liman Taba Wa 'Amana Wa `Amila Salihaan Thumma Ahtada
Wa Ma 'A`jalaka `An Qawmika Ya Musa
Qala Hum 'Ula'i `Ala 'Athari Wa `Ajiltu 'Ilayka Rabbi Litarđa
Qala Fa'inna Qad Fatanna Qawmaka Min Ba`dika Wa 'Ađallahumu As-Samiriyu

Faraja`a Musa 'Ila Qawmihi Ghađbana 'Asifaan Qala Ya Qawmi 'Alam Ya`idkum Rabbukum Wa`daan Hasanaan 'Afatala `Alaykumu Al-`Ahdu 'Am 'Aradtum 'An Yahilla `Alaykum Ghađabun Min Rabbikum Fa'akhlaftum Maw`idi
Qalu Ma 'Akhlafna Maw`idaka Bimalkina Wa Lakinna Hummilna 'Awzaraan Min Zinati Al-Qawmi Faqadhafnaha Fakadhalika 'Alqa As-Samiriyu
Fa'akhraja Lahum `Ijlaan Jasadaan Lahu Khuwarun Faqalu Hadha 'Ilahukum Wa 'Ilahu Musa Fanasiya
Afala Yarawna 'Alla Yarji`u 'Ilayhim Qawlaan Wa La Yamliku Lahum Đarraan Wa La Naf`aan
Wa Laqad Qala Lahum Harunu Min Qablu Ya Qawmi 'Innama Futintum Bihi Wa 'Inna Rabbakumu Ar-Rahmanu Fa Attabi`uni Wa 'Ati`u 'Amri
Qalu Lan Nabraha `Alayhi `Akifina Hatta Yarji`a 'Ilayna Musa
Qala Ya Harunu Ma Mana`aka 'Idh Ra'aytahum Đallu
Alla Tattabi`ani 'Afa`asayta 'Amri
Qala Yabna'uumma La Ta'khudh Bilihyati Wa La Bira'si 'Inni Khashitu 'An Taqula Farraqta Bayna Bani 'Isra'ila Wa Lam Tarqub Qawli
Qala Fama Khatbuka Ya Samiriyu
Qala Basurtu Bima Lam Yabsuru Bihi Faqabađtu Qabđatan Min 'Athari Ar-Rasuli Fanabadhtuha Wa Kadhalika Sawwalat Li Nafsi

Qala Fadh/hab Fa'inna Laka Fi Al-Hayaati 'An Taqula La Misasa Wa 'Inna Laka Maw`idaan Lan Tukhlafahu Wa Anzur 'Ila 'Ilahika Al-Ladhi Zalta `Alayhi `Akifaan Lanuharriqannahu Thumma Lanansifannahu Fi Al-Yammi Nasfaan
Innama 'Ilahukumu Allahu Al-Ladhi La 'Ilaha 'Illa Huwa Wasi`a Kulla Shay'in `Ilmaan
Kadhalika Naqussu `Alayka Min 'Anba'i Ma Qad Sabaqa Wa Qad 'Ataynaka Min Ladunna Dhikraan
Man 'A`rađa `Anhu Fa'innahu Yahmilu Yawma Al-Qiyamati Wizraan
Khalidina Fihi Wa Sa'a Lahum Yawma Al-Qiyamati Himlaan
Yawma Yunfakhu Fi As-Suri Wa Nahshuru Al-Mujrimina Yawma'idhin Zurqaan
Yatakhafatuna Baynahum 'In Labithtum 'Illa `Ashraan
Nahnu 'A`lamu Bima Yaquluna 'Idh Yaqulu 'Amthaluhum Tariqatan 'In Labithtum 'Illa Yawmaan
Wa Yas'alunaka `Ani Al-Jibali Faqul Yansifuha Rabbi Nasfaan
Fayadharuha Qa`aan Safsafaan
La Tara Fiha `Iwajaan Wa La 'Amtaan
Yawma'idhin Yattabi`una Ad-Da`i La `Iwaja Lahu Wa Khasha`ati Al-'Aswatu Lilrrahmani Fala Tasma`u 'Illa Hamsaan
Yawma'idhin La Tanfa`u Ash-Shafa`atu 'Illa Man 'Adhina Lahu Ar-Rahmanu Wa Rađiya Lahu Qawlaan
Ya`lamu Ma Bayna 'Aydihim Wa Ma Khalfahum Wa La Yuhituna Bihi `Ilmaan
Wa `Anati Al-Wujuhu Lilhayyi Al-Qayyumi Wa Qad Khaba Man Hamala Zulmaan
Wa Man Ya`mal Mina As-Salihati Wa Huwa Mu'uminun Fala Yakhafu Zulmaan Wa La Hađmaan
Wa Kadhalika 'Anzalnahu Qur'anaan `Arabiyaan Wa Sarrafna Fihi Mina Al-Wa`idi La`allahum Yattaquna 'Aw Yuhdithu Lahum Dhikraan
Fata`ala Allahu Al-Maliku Al-Haqqu Wa La Ta`jal Bil-Qur'ani Min Qabli 'An Yuqđa 'Ilayka Wahyuhu Wa Qul Rabbi Zidni `Ilmaan
Wa Laqad `Ahidna 'Ila 'Adama Min Qablu Fanasiya Wa Lam Najid Lahu `Azmaan
Wa 'Idh Qulna Lilmala'ikati Asjudu Li'dama Fasajadu 'Illa 'Iblisa 'Aba
Faqulna Ya 'Adamu 'Inna Hadha `Aduwun Laka Wa Lizawjika Fala Yukhrijannakuma Mina Al-Jannati Fatashqa
Inna Laka 'Alla Taju`a Fiha Wa La Ta`ra
Wa 'Annaka La Tazma'u Fiha Wa La Tađha
Fawaswasa 'Ilayhi Ash-Shaytanu Qala Ya 'Adamu Hal 'Adulluka `Ala Shajarati Al-Khuldi Wa Mulkin La Yabla
Fa'akala Minha Fabadat Lahuma Saw'atuhuma Wa Tafiqa Yakhsifani `Alayhima Min Waraqi Al-Jannati Wa `Asa 'Adamu Rabbahu Faghawa
Thumma Ajtabahu Rabbuhu Fataba `Alayhi Wa Hada
Qala Ahbita Minha Jami`aan Ba`đukum Liba`đin `Aduwun Fa'imma Ya'tiyannakum Minni Hudaan Famani Attaba`a Hudaya Fala Yađillu Wa La Yashqa
Wa Man 'A`rađa `An Dhikri Fa'inna Lahu Ma`ishatan Đankaan Wa Nahshuruhu Yawma Al-Qiyamati 'A`ma
Qala Rabbi Lima Hashartani 'A`ma Wa Qad Kuntu Basiraan
Qala Kadhalika 'Atatka 'Ayatuna Fanasitaha Wa Kadhalika Al-Yawma Tunsa
Wa Kadhalika Najzi Man 'Asrafa Wa Lam Yu'umin Bi'ayati Rabbihi Wa La`adhabu Al-'Akhirati 'Ashaddu Wa 'Abqa
Afalam Yahdi Lahum Kam 'Ahlakna Qablahum Mina Al-Quruni Yamshuna Fi Masakinihim 'Inna Fi Dhalika La'ayatin Li'wli An-Nuha
Wa Lawla Kalimatun Sabaqat Min Rabbika Lakana Lizamaan Wa 'Ajalun Musammaan
Fasbir `Ala Ma Yaquluna Wa Sabbih Bihamdi Rabbika Qabla Tulu`i Ash-Shamsi Wa Qabla Ghurubiha Wa Min 'Ana'i Al-Layli Fasabbih Wa 'Atrafa An-Nahari La`allaka Tarđa
Wa La Tamuddanna `Aynayka 'Ila Ma Matta`na Bihi 'Azwajaan Minhum Zahrata Al-Hayaati Ad-Dunya Linaftinahum Fihi Wa Rizqu Rabbika Khayrun Wa 'Abqa
Wa 'Mur 'Ahlaka Bis-Salaati Wa Astabir `Alayha La Nas'aluka Rizqaan Nahnu Narzuquka Wa Al-`Aqibatu Lilttaqwa
Wa Qalu Lawla Ya'tina Bi'ayatin Min Rabbihi 'Awalam Ta'tihim Bayyinatu Ma Fi As-Suhufi Al-'Ula
Wa Law 'Anna 'Ahlaknahum Bi`adhabin Min Qablihi Laqalu Rabbana Lawla 'Arsalta 'Ilayna Rasulaan Fanattabi`a 'Ayatika Min Qabli 'An Nadhilla Wa Nakhza
Qul Kullun Mutarabbisun Fatarabbasu Fasata`lamuna Man 'Ashabu As-Sirati As-Sawiyi Wa Mani Ahtada
